name: Dark Transparent Bookmark/History Sidebar Autohide
description:
This will make the sidebar act like a popup menu. Bookmark/history sidebars will be dark transparent. Other sidebars will require additional styling. Hover at the far left side of the screen to show the sidebar.

Install notes: Deactivate sidebar - install style - reactivate sidebar.
Tested in Firefox 4 & Minefield 4.2a1pre on Windows 7

Thanks to: user 60651 - style 36221
                user 169 - style 19972
                user 14809 - style 12055

02.07.11 - added transitions
12.31.10 - Border-radius adjustments; some code cleanup; updated screenshot
12.30.10 - Changed livemark folder and default livemark icon
12.21.10 - Removed extraneous code
12.17.10 - Linux fix
10.27.10 - font color changes
10.26.10 - Changed the open/closed folder icons to match style 37219; changed some font colors; removed border from search box
